actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to Provide in civil cases for juries of six persons, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that petit juries in United States District Courts shall consist of six juriors in civil cases at law, unless the parties shall stipulate to a lesser number. Provides that each party in such actions shall be entitled to two peremptory challenges. (Adds 28 U.S.C. 1875)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to Provide in civil cases for juries of six persons, and for other purposes.
